reviews.review: Great game with hundreds of custom maps (especially on TEK Servers).
Few games, those that are populated are populated with aimbotters.

Добился отметки в 100 ч. наигранных в данную игру. Редактирую обзор:
Плюсы:
Приятная графика
Найти людей в 2022 году ещё можно, но преимущественно англоговорящие (Русские есть)
Выбор классов (Как в TF2, но поменьше) 
На любой вкус оружия, вплоть до базуки.
Минусы:
Отношения Valve к этой игре
Баги, к примеру:Ложитесь в угол дома, а твои ноги выходят на улице, и тебя убивает не именно через стенку, а в ноги!
+ - Отдача может бесить, но если вы привыкнете, то вам будет без разницы с каким оружием играть, уже зависит от вашего скилла.
[b] >hack_me [/b]

It's just a shit version of the WW2 battlefields. It feels incredibly unpolished in all aspects, which can probably be attributed to the fact that this is an officialised version of a mod for half life.
Do you love boomers and "very historical accurate" modded servers? This game is for you!

I honestly got into DOD due to my Father, Hes a big gamer, hence where i got it from, All i have its nothing but amazing memories and met some amazing people whilst i was playing this , even though i was young, the WAD server my dad played on had  a JR section for all the older blokes kids that wanted to play, which was sick. I miss it, some of my best memories. Im always going cherish those days always

2021 Saturday afternoon, there are about 100 - 200 people playing right now. Steam charts says 500, but I'm just not seeing that.  The community that plays is pretty chill compared to Team Fortress Classic, and like TFC they play it regularly and know what they are doing. Unless you have an older computer, I would skip it for a game with more people/more servers, beginner friendly if that's a concern. It's an okay game that had it's time years ago.

One of the best WW2 game.

If you really want to play Battlefield V or COD WW2, But you don't have too much money or have a potato pc, This is the perfect game you're looking for.

Runs 200 fps on low end pc (lmao), not a really dead game (1000 playing on 2021), Perfectly not P2W (Except those servers that begs you to buy premium and stuff)

My guide to playing on servers that are not P2W:

1. Merillis Marauders (spelling wrong i think) So just search in servers browser "ma" and those servers would show.

2. Gun game servers

SERVERS TO NOT PLAY AT:

1. Fastpath, DO NOT PLAY AT THIS SERVER! It is faking players playing and everyone you see playing is actually a bot. It stores your steam information there and when you leave, they create a new bot with the steam info and people see you're pretty much there, forever. Also too much P2W.

Aight play this game it's very fun

Другими словами - тут очень весело.

This game is a good and affordable semi realistic World War 2 Fps game that runs in the gold source engine. The game gives you  a variety different settings which all take place in the year 1944. This game can be really fun especially while playing with friends. While the game does not have the player base that it use to have you can still find some servers with lots of people. I recommend purchasing this title to anyone that likes csgo or call of duty type games or even just war games in general.

Когда ещë не вышла ксго, все играли в ксс, раньше их пробовали в дисках в кослекте с хл2дм и додс
Когда я был маленьким брат купил тот диск, и он устовил ксс и мне додс, и тогда меня затянуло в эту замечательную игр. Я люблю стреляли, там я познакомился с разными дядьками
Прошло много лет , я и забыл про эту игрулю, но когда я зашел в Valve Completed Pack , я увидел еë, хоть на этом аккаунте я наиграл в не мало времени, но этого времени мне хватило получить удовольствие от игрового процесса
A relic from an age of low stakes, high skill ceiling team death match games. Solid, satisfying, punishing gunplay that easily keeps up with mechanics from any modern game.

If you live in Australia/New Zealand and have a VAC ban on ANY of your accounts, DO NOT, I repeat, DO NOT buy this game.

The one server that is active in this community for us has the most uptight admins you will ever have the misfortune of interacting with.

I got permanently banned from the server for buying the game on an alt account, as the server automatically kicks people with VAC bans. After explaining my situation, saying I've been VAC banned 9 years ago for injecting custom lobby programs into MW2 and MW3, they STILL didn't allow me to play on their server, with no reason given.

As well as this, the admins are very very picky with who they let play on the server, if they detect that your account is new, they ban you for a week for "Account to Check", which usually ends up being upgraded to a permanent ban. They also willingly kick people who do simple things such as change their Steam name often etc.

What a waste of 15 dollars.
